content: Mary had 10 cookies and gave half to her friend Jane. How many ice cream cones does Mary have left?

I'm a bit confused by your question. You mentioned that Mary had 10 cookies and gave half to her friend Jane. So, Mary had 10 cookies initially and gave 5 cookies to Jane, right? But then you asked how many ice cream cones Mary has left. I'm not sure about the ice cream cones because you only mentioned cookies at the beginning. Did Mary have any ice cream cones to begin with? I need more information to answer your question accurately.
